name: Qualify new leads from Google Sheets based on Clearbit metrics.
description: Every time a user is added to your Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically verify with Clearbit if the user's company meets the minimum qualifications. Then, the lead status is updated in Google Sheets. This template requires to make a copy of [this example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1gU_--crzsMVwP3G6zL3w2tfEJRRmNS8eYFrLbzYG7LM/edit?usp=sharing).
